response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,500,000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. We believe this offers a fair compromise that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
